column5: Looking to do a combo bear hunt/fishing trip this spring. Have been going to Canada for the past 10 years strictly fishing, but have always wanted to do a combo trip. Must have decent lodging with running water and great fishing. Any suggestions would be appreciated.
Brace lake outfitters offer a bear fishing combo. The lodge is top notch and the fishing is too, Mike Borger did a great report on it a few years back you can check it out at canadafishingguide.net
Northwinds Canadian Outfitters in Vermilion Bay offers Bear and Fishing trips also.
